categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Kelsoblod was the user ID of an individual who used the Cularin holonet node during the time of the Clone Wars. Kelsoblod was among a number of users who posted on the board in response to a message posted on the node, which was supposedly a copy of a Thaereian military internal memo ordering Cularin-based Thaereian commanders to crush all resistance the Thaereians on Cularin. Kelsoblod claimed to be scared by the memo and thought that the people of Cularin were powerless to stop the actions of the Thaereians.
